text: Kinda reminds me of so many other fortunes built on things which are ancient. Howard Schultz (Starbucks), Ben Cohen and Jerry Greenfield (Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream), Steve Ells (Chipotle), Dave Dahl (Dave's Killer Bread) and so on, just on what we eat and drink.
